[Portrait]Man's Voice[Dialog]
So, the marquis has fallen.{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>[Dialog]
And who might you be?{END}

[Portrait]Man[Dialog]
My name is Cletienne.

I come in Lord Folmarv's stead,
to see his will made manifest.{END}

A knight of the templarate, then!
Where is Alma!?{END}

My...my limbs are frozen!
What foul trick is this!?{END}

[Portrait]Cletienne[Dialog]
A time magick of my own fabrication, its might
all but wasted on one such as you.
I thought myself overcautious in readying a
trap, but it appears that was not the case.

You'll find no avail in a struggle. You've not
the strength of will to break free.

Make your peace. You go to the gods.{END}

What!?{END}

[Portrait]Woman's Voice[Dialog]
Ser Cletienne. How long has it
been since last we met?{END}

Yours is an unexpected sight. Tell me,
when did you don the traitor's cloak?{END}

[Portrait]Meliadoul[Dialog]
I was not aware I had. Is not that garment
draped about your own shoulders?
It is Isilud and I who were used, by you
and all the others!{END}

What of it, if you were?{END}

Those sins will be atoned for. There shall
be no mercy-not even for you.{END}

[Portrait]Meliadoul[Dialog]
Know you the Stones' secret-what it
is my father means to do?{END}

[Portrait]Cletienne[Dialog]
He strives towards a grand and lofty goal.
Of it, I will say no more.
Such things exceed your feeble capacity
for understanding.{END}

You know the truth, and yet you
aid him!?

But...but why?{END}

*chuckle* My reasons,
you've no need to know.{END}

[Portrait]Meliadoul[Dialog]
Isilud...forgive me...{END}

[Portrait]Cletienne[Dialog]
This I did not foresee.

But surely the time I've bought
will suffice.{END}

[Portrait]Meliadoul[Dialog]
Ser Cletienne, wait!

Is...is it true? Is my father...a
Lucavi?{END}

You've eyes, have you not?
Go and see for yourself.{END}

Could he...truly be?{END}
